translations: 战斗，斗争（combat 的第三人称单数）

phrs.translation: n. 战斗疲劳症；前线战士神经疲劳症

sentences.sentence: For many great deeds are performed in petty combats.
sentences.translation: 因为在小小的斗争里，常有许多伟大的活动。

sentences.sentence: Wilkinson says the gel combats the “I had a run-in with a can of paint” defense.
sentences.translation: 威尔金斯说，这种凝胶正好用于对付那些“带着一桶油漆满街涂抹”的人。

sentences.sentence: It is more powerful than any other acne treatment because it combats acne from the inside-out.
sentences.translation: 它更强大，因为它比任何其他治疗痤疮痤疮战斗从内部淘汰。
